hints.startsWith: Il Pokemon segreto inizia con la lettera:

intro.welcome: Welcome to the world of POKéMON!
intro.text: Every day a wild POKéMON from gen 1-3 will be hiding and its your job as a POKéMON TRAINER to catch (guess) it!

1.title: Guess One:
1.text: Guess any random POKéMON from gen 1-3 , since we currently have no clues. We will guess SQUIRTLE.

2.title: 2. Guess:
2.text: We now know that we are looking for a BLUE POKéMON. Furthermore the POKéMON has to be in its final evolution stage. Lastly, the POKéMON is NOT  from gen 1. Let's guess HERACROSS since it matches these characteristics.

3.title: 3. Guess:
3.text: Now we know the hidden POKéMON MUST be from gen 3. Since the hidden POKéMON cannot be a WATER TYPE, this leaves only a couple of possible options Let's guess SALAMANCE

4.title: 4. Guess:
4.text: We now know that the POKéMON lives in ROUGH TERRAIN and is in evolution stage 3. This leaves only one POKéMON; METAGROSS.

contribute.wantToContribute: Willing to contribute? Thats great! 🥳 You can find info on how to reach me at the bottom of this card.
contribute.helpNeeded: At the time of this writing, some of the things I could use help with are:
